ModMetaData.name: Strange plants
ModMetaData.author: ✬Rustic Fox✬
ModMetaData.description:
A mod that adds the abillity to grow the following:
- Artillery Shells Req Lvl 10 Growing - Beers Req Lvl 8 Growing - Componets Req Lvl 10 Growing - Chemfuels Req Lvl 10 Growing - Chocolates Req Lvl 8 Growing - Glitterworld Meds Req Lvl 18 Growing - Insect Jelly Req Lvl 10 Growing - Joywires Req Lvl 12 Growing - Neurotrainers Req Lvl 18 Growing - Painstoppers Req Lvl 12 Growing
*Disclaimer* Early Version balance will be worked on. This is updated do to popular request will be minamal support as i am working on the redesign for this mod no eta yet
Credits
Art - Chicken Plucker
Version: 1.0.1
